coreValues.heading: Our Core Values
coreValues.planning: We conduct social mapping to understand the needs of the community.
coreValues.implementing: We work together with you to implement an effective program.
coreValues.closing: We measure the impact using appropriate tools and methods.
coreValues.evaluating: We are evaluating the program to create the next steps.

hero.heading: Strategic CSR Partners for Real Impact.
hero.subheading: We assist companies in implementing strategic, impactful, and sustainable CSR for society and the environment.

whyChooseUs.heading: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.subheading: We believe that an effective CSR program requires a strategic and planned approach. Sirkular Center Indonesia offers services to assist your company in creating a relevant, measurable, and impactful CSR program.

skills-and-experiences.label: Skills and Experiences
skills-and-experiences.description: We have worked with various national and international companies.

custom-approach.label: Custom Approach
custom-approach.description: Every program is designed according to the specific needs of the company and the community.

real-impact.label: Real Impact
real-impact.description: We ensure that each program creates measurable and sustainable change.

testimonial.heading: From Our Clients

programs.name: Our Social Programs
programs.hero: CSR Solutions That Improve Lives and Make a Positive Impact
programs.subheading: At Sirkular Center Indonesia, we believe that every company has the potential to create meaningful change. With a data-driven approach and best practices in Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR), we offer a variety of social programs that can have a real impact, both for the community and the surrounding environment.

works.name: Our Works
works.hero: CSR Solutions Trail That Provides Real Impact

clients.heading: Companies we have helped
clients.subheading: See how we help companies create sustainable positive change through strategic CSR programs.

list.heading: Our Works
list.subheading: We believe that an effective CSR program requires a strategic and planned approach. Sirkular Center Indonesia offers services to assist your company in creating a relevant, measurable, and impactful CSR program.

hero.heading: Realizing meaningful and sustainable CSR.
hero.subheading: We are corporate partners in developing and managing CSR programs based on social mapping, effective implementation, and transparent impact evaluation.

aboutUs.subheading: We are a trusted partner for companies looking to implement CSR programs in a targeted, effective, and sustainable manner. We are dedicated to assisting your company in designing and executing CSR programs that provide tangible benefits to the local community and the environment.

vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.subheading: Encouraging sustainable and inclusive social change through impactful CSR programs.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.0: Assisting the company in designing relevant and sustainable CSR programs.
mission.1: Empowering local communities through education, economic, health, environmental, and cultural programs.
mission.2: Measuring the impact of each program with transparent tools and methods.
mission.3: Increasing awareness of the importance of social responsibility among national and global companies.

contactUs.heading: Got Questions?
contactUs.subheading: We have the answers. Let's work together!
